medical_history.chief_complaint: Post-prandial mid-abdominal sharp, colicky pain and posterior rib pain.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 3 days prior to admission, characterized by post-prandial mid-abdominal sharp, colicky pain and posterior rib pain. The pain was attributed to lifting heavy objects. The patient also experienced nausea, which worsened following a large meal including ice cream, leading him to vomit several times to relieve the pain.
medical_history.past_medical_history: BPH, hyperlipidemia, CAD, skin cancer on left face.
medical_history.family_history: Mother died at age 'old age'. Father died after a CVA. One sibling with lung cancer (smoker).
